title: Unaligned usize in Range on custom target
body:
Trying to use a Range on my custom x86_64-based OS (spec below) is aborting on an unaligned usize. I tried this code: ```rust for _ in 0..7usize {} ``` What I expected: loops silently What happened: abort() is called My target spec: ```json { "llvm-target": "x86_64-unknown-none", "data-layout": "e-m:e-i64:64-f80:128-n8:16:32:64-S128", "arch": "x86_64", "target-endian": "little", "target-pointer-width": "64", "target-c-int-width": "64", "os": "none", "executables": true, "linker-flavor": "ld.lld", "linker": "rust-lld", "panic-strategy": "abort", "disable-redzone": true, "features": "-mmx,-sse,+soft-float" } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (44e3daf5e 2020-12-31) ```
Backtrace

``` #0 core::ptr::write (dst=0x157c14, src=0) at /home/dom/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2021-01-01-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ptr/mod.rs:888 #1 0x00000000001316de in core::ptr::swap_nonoverlapping_one (x=0x157e7c, y=0x157c14) at /home/dom/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2021-01-01-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ptr/mod.rs:460 #2 0x00000000001246e3 in core::mem::swap (x=0x157e7c, y=0x157c14) at /home/dom/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2021-01-01-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/mem/mod.rs:695 #3 0x0000000000124758 in core::mem::replace (dest=0x157e7c, src=1) at /home/dom/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2021-01-01-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/mem/mod.rs:822 #4 0x000000000013992c in core::iter::range::{{impl}}::next (self=0x157e7c) at /home/dom/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2021-01-01-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/iter/range.rs:508 #5 0x00000000001077f7 in domeos_kernel::start::parse_multiboot (multiboot=0x10000) at /home/dom/backups/20-29_Dev/dev/os/project/kernel/src/start.rs:46 #6 0x0000000000107255 in domeos_kernel::start::start (multiboot=0x10000) at /home/dom/backups/20-29_Dev/dev/os/project/kernel/src/start.rs:21 #7 0x00000000001070bf in domeos_kernel::kernel_main (magic=732803074, multiboot=0x10000) at /home/dom/backups/20-29_Dev/dev/os/project/kernel/src/lib.rs:35 #8 0x00000000001060c4 in long_mode () ``` My OS has jumped to long mode and other 64 bit Rust code is working fine. Checking size_of::() is definitely 8, yet the pointer `0x157c14` is not aligned.
